Manamah- T uharrak Bridge. This work was not commenced until almost the end of the year and then only at the particular wish of H.E. Shaikh Hamed. The road has been started from anoint on the shore of the Ras Rumman Quarter a few hundred yards south east of the Agency. Side walls to a distance of 1500 feet have been built and a small amount of filling has been done. The walls are about 5-| feet
